question.text: Experimental verification of 'chromosomal theory of inheritance' was done by ______.

options.text:
The person who united the knowledge of chromosomal
segregation with Mendelian principles.
The person who discovered linkage in Drosophila melanogaster.
The person who discovered linkage in Lathyrus odoratus.
The person who discovered mutation in Oenothera lamarckiana.

solution.text: Thomas Hunt Morgan and his colleagues worked on the sex linked genes of fruit fly Drosophila melanogaster. They showed that the two genes did not segregate independently of each other and F2 progeny ratio differed from the expected 9:3:3:1. Morgan concluded that the genes on same chromosome are linked to each other. Tightly linked genes showed very low recombination and vice versa.
